predicate.note: Frames file for 'dupe' based on sentences in wsj. No access to Verbnet at the moment.

example.name: sucker
example.text: He takes his wash to the laundromat, where he meets a punky French girl who [*T*-1] dupes him into [*] providing a home for her pet piranha and then promptly steals his car and dumps it in Dieppe.
example.arg: into [*] providing a home for her pet piranha
